title: 512. Does Philosophy Still Matter?
description: It used to be at the center of our conversations about politics and society. Scott Hershovitz (author of Nasty, Brutish, and Short) argues that philosophy still has a lot to say about work, justice, and parenthood. Our latest installment of the Freakonomics Radio Book Club.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
